UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Represents a user account within the CapstoneTrack system, differentiating user roles.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

email.description: Email address of the user account.

status.description: The status of the user account.

studentId.description: Reference to Student entity, if the user is a student. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 Student)

supervisorId.description: Reference to Supervisor entity, if the user is a supervisor. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 Supervisor)

Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student within the CapstoneTrack system.

className.description: The class name of the student (e.g., '22SE111').

phone.description: The phone number of the student.

CCCD.description: The citizen identification card number of the student.

status.description: The academic status of the student.

Supervisor.title: Supervisor
Supervisor.description: Represents a supervisor within the CapstoneTrack system.

facultyRank.description: The faculty rank of the supervisor.

GraduationDefenseSession.title: GraduationDefenseSession
GraduationDefenseSession.description: Represents a period for organizing graduation project defenses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the defense session.

name.description: Name of the defense session (e.g., 'Spring 2024 Defense').

startDate.description: The start date of the session.

expectedReportDate.description: The expected date for the final defense reports.

registrationDeadline.description: The deadline for students to register for this defense session.

description.description: A brief description of the session.

zaloGroupLink.description: URL link to the Zalo group for this session.

status.description: The current status of the defense session.

councilGraduationRubricId.description: Reference to the Rubric used for graduation defense by the council in this session.

councilInternshipRubricId.description: Reference to the Rubric used for internship evaluation by the council in this session.

supervisorGraduationRubricId.description: Reference to the Rubric used for graduation defense by the project supervisor.

companyInternshipRubricId.description: Reference to the Rubric used for internship evaluation by the company supervisor.

graduationCouncilWeight.description: The weight of the council's grade in the final graduation score (0-100).

internshipCouncilWeight.description: The weight of the council's grade in the final internship score (0-100).

DefenseSessionRegistration.title: DefenseSessionRegistration
DefenseSessionRegistration.description: Represents a student's registration for a specific defense session, including project and internship details.

sessionId.description: Reference to the GraduationDefenseSession this registration belongs to.

studentDocId.description: Reference to the student's document ID in the 'students' collection.

studentName.description: Full name of the student for display purposes.

registrationDate.description: Timestamp when the registration was created.

projectTitle.description: The title of the student's graduation project.

summary.description: A brief summary of the graduation project.

objectives.description: The objectives of the graduation project.

expectedResults.description: The expected results of the graduation project.

reportLink.description: A URL link to the full graduation project report.

supervisorId.description: Reference to the graduation project supervisor's document ID.

supervisorName.description: The name of the graduation project supervisor.

internshipSupervisorId.description: Reference to the internship supervisor's document ID.

internshipSupervisorName.description: The name of the internship supervisor.

graduationStatus.description: The registration status for the graduation defense.

graduationStatusNote.description: A note explaining the reason for the 'withdrawn' or other status for graduation.

graduationExemptionDecisionNumber.description: The official number of the graduation exemption decision document.

graduationExemptionDecisionDate.description: The date when the graduation exemption decision was made.

graduationExemptionProofLink.description: A URL link to the proof document for the graduation exemption.

internshipStatus.description: The registration status for the internship report.

internshipStatusNote.description: A note explaining the reason for the 'withdrawn' or other status for internship.

internshipExemptionDecisionNumber.description: The official number of the internship exemption decision document.

internshipExemptionDecisionDate.description: The date when the internship exemption decision was made.

internshipExemptionProofLink.description: A URL link to the proof document for the internship exemption.

subCommitteeId.description: Reference to the DefenseSubCommittee this registration is assigned to.

internship_companySupervisorName.description: Name of the supervisor at the internship company.

internship_companySupervisorPhone.description: Phone number of the supervisor at the internship company.

internship_registrationFormLink.description: URL to the internship registration form.

internship_commitmentFormLink.description: URL to the self-arranged internship commitment form.

internship_acceptanceLetterLink.description: URL to the internship acceptance letter from the company.

internship_feedbackFormLink.description: URL to the feedback form from the company.

internship_reportLink.description: URL to the full internship report.

DefenseCouncil.title: DefenseCouncil
DefenseCouncil.description: Represents a member of the defense council for a specific graduation session.

id.description: Unique identifier for the council member entry.

sessionId.description: Reference to the GraduationDefenseSession this council belongs to.

supervisorId.description: Reference to the supervisor's document ID in the 'supervisors' collection.

name.description: Full name of the supervisor for display purposes.

role.description: Role of the member within the council.

DefenseSubCommittee.title: DefenseSubCommittee
DefenseSubCommittee.description: Represents a sub-committee or panel within a graduation defense session.

sessionId.description: Reference to the GraduationDefenseSession this sub-committee belongs to.

name.description: Name of the sub-committee (e.g., 'Ti·ªÉu ban 1 - CNTT').

members.description: A list of members in this sub-committee.

Rubric.title: Rubric
Rubric.description: Defines a grading rubric for evaluating projects.

name.description: Name of the rubric (e.g., 'Final Project Defense Rubric').

description.description: A brief description of the rubric's purpose.

criteria.description: The list of criteria that make up this rubric.

maxScore.description: The maximum possible score for this criterion.

Evaluation.title: Evaluation
Evaluation.description: Stores a single evaluation of a student's registration by a supervisor.

registrationId.description: Reference to the student's registration for the session.

evaluatorId.description: The supervisor's ID who performed the evaluation.

rubricId.description: Reference to the rubric used for this evaluation.

evaluationType.description: The type of evaluation (e.g., graduation or internship).

scores.description: The scores given for each criterion.

SystemSettings.title: SystemSettings
SystemSettings.description: Stores global system settings and feature flags.

enableOverallGrading.description: If true, allows graders to input an overall score which is then distributed among criteria.

allowStudentRegistration.description: If true, allows new students to register for an account.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user account information including their role.

/graduationDefenseSessions/{sessionId}.description: Stores information about graduation defense sessions.

/defenseRegistrations/{registrationId}.description: Stores student registrations for all defense sessions.

/graduationDefenseSessions/{sessionId}/c.description: Stores the members of the main defense council for a specific session.

/graduationDefenseSessions/{sessionId}/s.description: Stores the sub-committees (panels) for a specific defense session.

/evaluations/{evaluationId}.description: Stores individual evaluation records from supervisors.

/systemSettings/{settingId}.description: Stores global system-wide settings and feature flags.
